name: Ant Wars SE
description:
Ant Wars is a strategy game, where you command armies of ants on a battlefield. Your goal is to take out all of the hives by occupying the empty ones and attacking the others taken by your enemies.

You gain score after completing a level. The faster you complete, the fewer ants you loose, the more points you get.
If you complete all the levels or you lose all your lives, you can see your total score, which you can share online with others.

Ant Wars Special Edition
- 9 special (hard) levels added!!!

Feauters:

- 3 ant types
- 51 levels
- Agon based Online High Score
- Unique gameplay

If you liked Galcon, you will love AntWars.

What people say:
- Great game! This is my favourite. I can only recommend this to everyone!
- This game does everything right that Galcon did wrong. Buy it now!
- Great job! This game is a lot of fun. I hope you make a ton of money because you deserve it!
